import React from "react" import s from "./Users.module.css" import axios from "axios" import ph from "../../assets/images/tetatet.jpeg" let Users = (props) => { let getUsers = () => { if (props.users.length === 0) { axios.get("https://social-network.samuraijs.com/api/1.0/users") .then(response => { props.setUsers(response.data.items) }) } } return
{props.users.map(u =>
{u.followed ? : }
{u.name}
{u.status}
{u.id}
{"u.location.city"}
)}
} export default Users /* [ { id: 1, photoUrl: "https://android-obzor.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/03/28e4ac42f547e6ac0f50f7cfa916ca93.jpg", followed: false, fullName: "Pozdeev", status: "Будем тусиииить", location: { city: "Izhevsk", country: "russia" }, }, { id: 2, photoUrl: 'https://webmg.ru/wp-content/uploads/2022/10/i-26-125-768x1169.jpeg', followed: true, fullName: "John Conor", status: "i will be back!", location: { city: "London", country: "GB" }, }, { id: 3, photoUrl: 'https://webmg.ru/wp-content/uploads/2022/10/i-26-125-768x1169.jpeg', followed: false, fullName: "Massiv", status: "i love this world", location: { city: "Objeckwill", country: "Immaginarium" }, }, ], */
